p: Perceived barriers to PrEP use in the PrEP attribute domain were most common: “ PrEP costs too much” (50%) and “ I am concerned about long-term side-effects” (41%) ( Table 2). Followed by “ I have limited access to healthcare services” (32%) in the structural domain, “ Taking PrEP might tempt me to have CAI” (31%) in the individual domain, and “ People might assume I am HIV+” (28%) in the interpersonal domain.
